author: Jens Gulden
title: Meta-model Patterns for Expressing Relationships Between Organization Model Concepts and Software Implementation Concepts
booktitle: Joint Proceedings of the First International Workshop On the Globalization of Modeling Languages (GEMOC 2013) and the First International Workshop: Towards the Model Driven Organization (AMINO 2013) Co-located with the 16th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2013), Miami, USA, September 29 - October 04, 2013
